subject: Project Update
body: Hello team, this is a reminder that the next project update meeting is scheduled for Thursday at 10:00 AM. Please prepare your weekly progress summary.

subject: System Maintenance
body: Our IT department will perform scheduled system maintenance this Saturday from 2:00 AM to 6:00 AM. Services may be temporarily unavailable.

subject: Client Feedback
body: We received new feedback from the client regarding the current prototype. They requested adjustments to the user interface and a clearer onboarding flow.

subject: Meeting Follow-Up
body: Thank you for attending today's meeting. Attached are the meeting notes and a list of action items for the upcoming sprint.

subject: Training Session
body: A mandatory training session on workplace security protocols is scheduled for next Tuesday. Please register using the link provided.

subject: Onboarding Documents
body: Welcome! Please submit your onboarding documents by the end of the week. Let us know if you have any questions.

subject: Product Launch
body: The marketing team has finalized the timeline for the upcoming product launch. More details will be shared in tomorrow's briefing.

subject: Performance Review
body: This is a reminder that quarterly performance reviews will take place next month. Managers will follow up with scheduling details.

subject: Team Event
body: We are organizing a team-building event next Friday. Participation is optional, and lunch will be provided.

subject: Resource Request
body: Your request for additional development resources has been received. We will review and get back to you shortly.
